name: Squatting Double Penetration
description:
This is my first sex position LoRA and took me way to much time. All training images were also generated using SD, since the pose is really hard to find via regular search.

Be sure to use: clip skip 2, highres.fix (0.25-0.35, ~25steps)

Always add: <lora:Squat_Suck_18:0.8>, squatting, 1boy, vaginal,

I suggest using 0.6-0.8 as the LoRA weight.

Since all training images were generated, the style likes to bleed through when going higher. Also likes to sometimes delete the guys back leg. It works really well with style LoRAs.

The following things can be changed fairly well via additional tags:

anal: replace "vaginal" with "anal"

deepthroat: add "deepthroat", more weight = deeper

irrumatio: add "irrumatio, hand on anothers head"

You can also roll the finger lottery and add "holding penis" to the prompt (don't combine with "deepthroat"). If you get lucky you can get her to hold the penis, but this is fairly inconsistent.

If you get a perfect picture but the face is still somehow messed up my trick is to use "LottaLewds" BallsDeep LoRA via inpaint. To do this:

  • inpaint the entire face + the tip of penis entering the mouth (not the hair)

  • chose: inpaint marked, original, only masked, 0.55-0.65 denoise

  • use the basic prompt for your character, while removing things that define the body

  • add: <lora:lottalewdsBallsDeep_v1:1>, from side, sloppy blowjob, blowjob face, cum in mouth,

Tips:

  • You can remove remnants of fingers on the penis by adding "arms behind back"

  • make sure you do not have facial expressions like "smile", "grin" in your prompt

The LoRA was trained on 27 pictures (i went thought at least 200 until settling on these) in anything v3, and the images were all generated on AOM2/orangemix vae and were not inpainted at all.

You can help to improve this model by posting good pictures using the pose on this page. The things that'd help me most with advancing it would be entirely different styles, pictures where the guys back leg is very clearly visible and good pictures of the girl holding the penis.

My character prompts also all include: "beautiful, masterpiece, best quality, extremely detailed face, perfect lighting, 1girl, solo", so if it doesn't quite get there for you try adding some of these.

*all depicted characters are above the age of 18.
